text:
New York CIty, NY; Full time; VISA; ONSITE only; Will relocate; VIMEO

Vimeo.com is looking to hire Software Engineers for the following opportunities...

Lead Engineer, Creator Platform...http://bit.ly/1P0uZUZ (JavaScript, PHP, React.JS)

Senior Android Engineer, Cameo...http://bit.ly/1MI5Boq (Android exp, Java, C, OpenGL)

API Engineer...http://bit.ly/1E4xcbr (API Exp, PHP, JS, OAuth)

DevOps Engineer...http://bit.ly/1N4DfSw (Linux, Chef, Puppet, AWS, Python)

Front-End Engineer...http://bit.ly/1E4z0Bd (JS, HTML5, CSS, SASS)

If anyone is interested in hearing more about these opportunities please email Samer Zaben at samer@vimeo.com
